bobby.engine.bobengine

Class Touch

  • java.lang.Object
    • bobby.engine.bobengine.Touch

  • public class Touch
extends java.lang.Object
    This class listens for and handles touch input.
    Version:
    alpha
    Author:
    Ben

    • Method Detail

      • areaTouched

        public boolean areaTouched(double x1,
                           double y1,
                           double x2,
                           double y2)
        Returns true if the are described by x1, y1, x2, and y2 is being touched.
        Parameters:
        x1 - - X coord of the top-left corner of the box
        y1 - - Y coord of the top-left corner
        x2 - - X coord of the bottom-right corner
        y2 - - Y coord of teh bottom-right corner
        Returns:
        true if touched by any finger, false otherwise

      • objectTouched

        public boolean objectTouched(GameObject o)
        Returns true if GameObject o is touched.
        Parameters:
        o - - GameObject to check if is touched
        Returns:
        True if o is being touched by any pointer, false otherwise.

      • held

        public boolean held()
        Returns true if any pointers are currently touching the screen.

      • held

        public boolean held(int index)
        Check if a number of fingers are touching the screen.
        Parameters:
        index - - the number of fingers to check
        Returns:
        True if index number of fingers are touching the screen, false otherwise.

      • onTouch

        public boolean onTouch(View v,
                       MotionEvent event)
        Handle touch events.

        This method will...
        ...trigger new presses.
        ...trigger releases.
        ...get touch positions.
